ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Calculating AC
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard serious stuff saying that your get new starting levels of AC every 25 pts of agi, dextery also works that way. Caster s mana will work the same,
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard serious stuff saying that your get new "starting levels" of AC
every 25 pts of agi, dextery also works that way.
Caster's mana will work the same, but every 5pts (either int or wis).
I havent tested this...

Ericka, the sexyest bard on Prexus




t 12:31 14/03/00 -0800, you wrote:
>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
>
>IF AC is less than 75, it gives you a significant decrease in AC though.
>
>>-----Original Message-----
>>From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
>>Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 12:26 PM
>>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Calculating AC
>>
>>
>>From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>
>>
>>up till 100 it's nearly 1 to 1. After 100 it goes down
>>dramatically. After
>>about 120 agil it's like 5 agil to 1 ac
>>
>>Whereas straight AC works with your defense bonus. Not sure the exact
>>calculation but at level 34ish AC multiplier appears to be about 2.5xRAW
>>(Where RAW is the raw AC of the item) . That's far from accurate,
>>I haven't
>>done any 'testing' yet but that appears to be the case.
>>
>>Lyrnia Jongleur
>>----- Original Message -----
>>From: <roleplay@...>
>>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>>Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 3:03 PM
>>Subject: [eqbards] Calculating AC
>>
>>
>>> From: <roleplay@...>
>>>
>>> Is there a known formula for calculation the affect of Agility on AC? Or
>>Stamina on Hit points?
>>>
>>> Thanks
>>>
>>> Ranian
>>>
